p: ATOMIC2 is positioned between primary and secondary care populations with several unique features. Selection of a population who have presented to secondary care will focus recruitment on those with significant early symptoms and a high risk (20–30%) of readmission within the next 2 weeks, and yet, we believe, not too late in the disease process for suppression of pulmonary macrophage-derived inflammatory cytokines to have a potentially clinically meaningful beneficial effect.
